amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount appropriated for the Federal Prison system by $97,400,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease appropriations for the Federal Prison system by $97,400,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 283 (Roll no. 356).
